channel.title: SoftMC Runescape Private Server Development Team Open For Easter!
channel.description:
[center][b]SoftMC Runescape Private Server Development Team Open For Easter BETA Test!![/b] [i]Welcome to my next development and most probally the last SoftMc just hopes that the server and forums dont die as we are keeping it up as much as we can the forums are open but are going down for development after i posted this i have not yet got pictures of the server as it is under development by me but you can put your name n for a graphics designer, global mod on forums, admin on server, mod of server or other things [/i][/center]
[center] [b]Seems some of you didnt read the top i heres the list of Jobs[/b] [b]Admin For Server[/b] [b] Mod For server[/b] [b] Global Mod For Forums[/b]
[b]Graphics Designer[/b]
[b]Java Handlers[/b]
[b]BETA Testers[/b]
[b]Server Helpers[/b]
[b]Webclient Maker (i will send you client)[/b]
[i](add more jobs soon)[/i][/center] [center][i] So if you would care to join it would be great you can add me on msn now i will be on for a little wile when i am busy doing the forums So Please add my msn [/i] [b]My Msn[/b] javaproject@hotmail.co.uk
[i]Well thanks[/i][/center] [center] [b]Application Form[/b]
Job: Exp: Any Proof: Any comments: Must join forums and be active to be staff will you do this: [b] Staff[/b] [i]Moove Head of graphic Team[/i] [i]MladenJ Mod On Server[/i][/center]
[center][b]Pictures![/b] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/Untitled-1copy.gif[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] ...[/center]

item.title: SoftMC Runescape Private Server Development Team Open For Easter!
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

[quote=“zilchuary, post:1, topic:191376”][quote author=MladenJ link=topic=254989.msg2125021#msg2125021 date=1206131931]
Job: Either Mod on server, or Server Helpers.

Exp: I run my own server 24.7 admin there, really respectfull. And trustworthy

Any Proof: join reborn.zapto.org or come to www.reborn-server.co.nr

Any comments: Im interested in helping you.

Must join forums and be active to be staff will you do this: yes.

[/quote]
Accepted

Job:if you have coder open ill do that( im a kickass coder)
Exp:5 months
Any Proof:i made my own server(currently called just-pwn v2)
Any comments:if you want me then take me idrc
Must join forums and be active to be staff will you do this:yes i will

im asking for java handler coders
if you can get me a good fleching handler made by you i will accept you[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

[center]SoftMC Runescape Private Server Development Team Open For Easter BETA Test!!
Welcome to my next development and most probally the last
SoftMc just hopes that the server and forums dont die as we are keeping it up as much as we can
the forums are open but are going down for development after i posted this
i have not yet got pictures of the server as it is under development by me but you can put your name n for a graphics designer, global mod on forums, admin on server, mod of server or other things
[/center]

[center]
Seems some of you didnt read the top i heres the list of Jobs
Admin For Server

Mod For server

Global Mod For Forums

Graphics Designer

Java Handlers

BETA Testers

Server Helpers

Webclient Maker (i will send you client)

(add more jobs soon)[/center]
[center]
So if you would care to join it would be great
you can add me on msn now i will be on for a little wile when i am busy doing the forums
So Please add my msn

My Msn
javaproject@hotmail.co.uk

Well thanks[/center]
